title: 4-win IP boost when I logged in?
body:
Hi, 
I just randomly got a 4 win IP boost when I logged in..
Anybody know why that might have happened?

replies.body: I got it twice too... don't think i deserved it but i'll take it haha
It's because you left your Facebook connection thing on during the whole 24 hours of the 1st of June.
I just got one, happy farming {{champion:222}}
